juzs.text: And We did not descend on his nation from after him from soldiers/warriors from the sky/space, and We were not sent descending
That (E) (it) was except one loud strong cry/torture raid so then they are still/silent/dead
Oh grief/sorrow on the slaves/servants , none from a messenger comes to them, except (that) they were with him mocking/making fun
Do they not see/understand how many We destroyed before them from the generations/peoples of eras/centuries, that they, to them they do not return
And that (E) each/all (E) all/all together (are) at/by Us, they are made to be present/made to attend
And an evidence/sign for them (is) the land/Earth the dead, We revived it, and We brought out from it seeds/grains, so from it they eat
And We made/put in it treed gardens from palm trees and grapes, and We caused to flow/burst in it from the water springs/water wells
To eat from its fruit, and what their hands made/did/worked it, so do they not thank/be grateful
Praise/glory (to) who created the pairs/kinds all of it, from what the land/Earth prouts/grows, and from themselves and from what they do not know
And an evidence/sign for them (is) the night, We skin off/uncover from it the daytime, so then they are darkened/in darkness
And the sun passes/orbits to an establishment/affixation to it, that (is) the glorious`/mighty`s predestination/evaluation
And the moon We predestined/evaluated it (in) sequences/descents until it returned as/like the palm tree`s branch/date bunch, the old
The sun should not (be) to it that it catches up/overtakes/reaches the moon, and nor the night (is) surpassing/preceding the daytime, and each (is) in (an) orbit/circuit floating
And an evidence/sign for them (is) that We, We carried/loaded their descendants in the ship/ships, the full/loaded
And We created for them from similar/equal/alike to it, what they ride/board
And if We will/want We drown/sink them, so (there be) no cries for help/aiders for them, and nor they be rescued/saved
Except mercy from Us, and a long life/enjoyment to a time
And if (it) was said to them: "Fear and obey what (is) between your hands and what (is) behind you, maybe/perhaps you attain mercy
And none from an evidence/sign/verse from their Lord`s evidences/signs/verses comes to them except they were from it objecting/opposing/turning away

And if (it) was said to them: "Spend from what God provided for you." Those who disbelieved said to those who believed: "Do we feed whom if God wanted/willed He fed him? That truly you are in except clear/evident misguidance
And they say: "When (is) that the promise, if you were truthful
They do not wait except (for) one loud strong cry/torture raid (that) punishes/punishes them, and (while) they are disputing/controverting with each other
So they are not being able (of) direction/influence , and nor to their families they return
And (it) was blown in the horn/bugle so then they are from the graves to their Lord they drop/rush down
They said: "Oh our calamity/scandal who sent/woke us up from our place of sleep? That (is) what the merciful promised and the messengers were truthful
That truly (it) was except one loud strong cry/torture raid, so then they are all/all together at Us, they are made to be present/made to attend
So the day/today no self be caused injustice to/be oppressed a thing, and you are not being reimbursed except (for) what you were making/doing
That the Paradises` friends/company the day/today (are) in work/occupation/function enjoying/joyful/humorous
They and their spouses (are) in shades on the luxurious beds/couches leaning on/reclining on
For them in it (are) fruits, and for them what they call/wish/desire
A greeting/safety/security , a word/saying from a merciful Lord
And be distinguished/separated the day/today, oh you, the criminals/sinners
Did I not entrust/make a contract to you, Adam`s sons and daughters, that do not worship the devil ,that he truly is for you a clear/evident enemy
And that (E) worship Me, that (is) a straight/direct road/way
And he (the devil) had (E) misguided many nations/creations from you, were you not being understanding/comprehending
This (is) Hell which you were being promised
The day/today roast/suffer/burn (from) it because (of) what you were disbelieving
The day/today We seal off/stamp on their mouths, and their hands converse/speak to Us , and their feet witness/testify with what they were earning/acquiring
And if We will/want We would have wiped out/destroyed on their eyes/sights, so they raced/surpassed/preceded the road/way, so how (do) they see/understand
And if We will/want We would have transformed them to worse shape/metamorphosed them on their capacity/place/position, so they were not able (of) passing/preceding/completing , and nor they return
And whom We grant him long life We reverse him (make him senile) in the creation, do they not reason/understand
And We did not teach/instruct him the poetry, and (it) should not (be) for him that it is except (a) reminder and (a) clear/evident Koran
To warn/give notice to who was/is alive and the opinion and belief/saying/word becomes deserved/truth on the disbelievers
Did they not see/understand that We created for them from what Our hands made/did camels/livestock, so they are for it owning/possessing
And We manipulated/eased it for them, so from it (is) their riding , and from it they eat
And for them in it (are) benefits/uses and drinking places, so do they not thank/be grateful
And they took from other than God, gods, maybe/perhaps they be given victory/aid
They are not being able (of) giving them victory/aiding them, and they are for them soldiers/warriors being made to be present/attend
So let not their word/opinion and belief to sadden/make you grievous, that We know what they keep secret and what they declare/publicize
Does not the human/mankind see/understand that We created him from a drop/male`s or female`s secretion , so then he is a clear/evident disputer/adversary/arguer
And he gave to us an example/proverb, and he forgot his creation, he said: "Who revives/makes alive the bones and (while) it is decayed/decomposed
Say: "Revives/makes it alive (God) who created/originated it (the) first/beginning time, and He is with every/each creation knowledgeable
Who created/made/put for you from the trees the green a fire, so then you are from it igniting/kindling
Or is not who created the skies/space and the earth/Planet Earth, with capable on that He creates equal/alike to them . Yes/certainly and He is the creator, the knowledgeable
But/truly His order/command if He wanted/willed a thing, (is) that He says to it: "Be." so it becomes
So praise/glory (to) who with His hands (are) every thing`s ownership/might and power , and to Him you are being returned
And the expanded and motionless wings in a row, arranged
So the preventing/deterring , preventing/deterring/ousting
So the reading/reciting/following, mentioning/remembering
That truly your Lord (is) one (E)
Lord (of) the skies/space and the earth/Planet Earth and what (is) between them (B), and Lord (of) the sun rises/easts
That We decorated/beautified the sky/space (of) the present world with the stars`/planets` decoration/beauty
And a protection/guarding from every/each rebellious/mutinous devil
They do not hear/listen (E) to the nobles/assembly the highest/mightiest/most dignified, and they be thrown/hurled from every/each side/direction
Expelled/driven away , and for them (is) a permanent/continuous/lasting torture
Except who snatched the one snatch, so a light from a fire source/a star lit/ignited/penetrating followed him
So ask/take their opinion , are they a stronger creation, or who We created? That We created them from very sticky mud/clay
But you wondered/were astonished/were surprised, and they humiliate/mock/undermine/ridicule
And if they were reminded, they do not mention/remember
And if they saw/understood an evidence/sign/verse, they humiliate/mock/ridicule/undermine

Is (it that) if we died and we were dust and bones, are we being resurrected/revived (E)
Or our fathers the first/beginners
Say: "Yes, and you are degraded/lowly
So but it is a one cry to drive out , so then they are looking/seeing
And they said: "Oh our calamity/scandal that, it is the Judgment Day/Resurrection Day
That (is) the Judgment Day/Separation Day/Resurrection Day which you were with it lying/denying/falsifying
Gather those who were unjust/oppressive and their spouses , and what they were worshipping
From other than God, so guide them to the Hell`s road/way
And stop/suspend them , that they are questioned
And what (is it) for you, you do not give victory/aid
But they are the day/today submitting/surrendering
And some of them approached/came on (to) some, they ask/question each other
They said: "That you were coming to us from the right (side)
They said: "But you were not being believing
And (there) was not from power/control for us over you, but you were a tyrannizing/arrogant nation
So became deserved on us our Lord`s word/saying , that we (are) tasting/experiencing
So we misguided/lured you , that we were misguiding
So then they are (on) that day in the torture sharing
We, like that, We make/do with the criminals/sinners
That they truly were if (it) was said to them: "No God except god" they be arrogant
And they say: "Are we to leave our gods to a mad/insane poet
But He came with the truth and he confirmed the messengers
That you are tasting/experiencing the torture, the painful
And you are not being reimbursed except (for) what you were making/doing/working
Except God`s worshippers/slaves , the faithful/loyal
Those, for them (is) a known provision
Fruits, and they are honoured
In the blessed/comfort and ease treed gardens/paradises
On beds/sofas facing each other
Being circled/walked around on them with a cup/container to drink from/wine from goodness
White (a) delight/pleasure to the drinking
Destruction/intoxication (is) not in it, nor they be drunk/made to loose their minds/drained/exhausted from it
And at them the eye`s/eyelid`s confining/limiting/restricting big beautiful eyes
As though they are (F) protected/covered whites/eggs
So some of them approached/came on (to) some, they ask/question each other
A speaker from them said: "That I, (there) was for me (a) companion
He says: "You are (E) from the confirming/charity givers
Is (it that) if we died, and we were dust and bones are we indebted (E)
He said: "Are you knowing/seeing/looking
So he looked/saw, so he saw him in the Hell`s middle
He said: "By God if you were about to to make me fall/ruin (E)
And where it not for my Lord`s blessing/goodness I would have been from the made present/attending
So are we not with dying
Except our death/lifelessness the first/beginning, and we are not with being tortured
That this it is (E) the winning/success the great
Similar/equal/alike to this, so the makers/doers/workers, should make/do/work
Is that a better place of descent or the deadly food`s tree
That We made/put it (as) a test/charm to the unjust/oppressive
That it is a tree it emerges in the Hell`s source/root
Its first fruit of the season as though it (is) the devils` heads/tops
So then they are eating exaggerated/gluttons from it, so they are filling from it the bellies/insides
Then for them on it (is) a mixture/heat (E) from hot/cold water/red hot coal
Then that their return (is) to (E) the Hell
That they truly found their fathers misguided

And most of the first/beginners had been (E) misguided before them

So look/see/wonder about how was the warned`s/given notice`s end/turn (result)

And Noah had called/cried (to) Us, so blessed/praised (E) (are) the answerers/repliers
And We saved/rescued him and his family/relation from the grief, hardship and suffering the great
And We made/put his descendants, they are the remaining
And We left on him in the lasts
Peace/security on Noah in the creations are together/(universes)
We (E) like that, We reimburse the good doers
That he truly is from Our worshippers/slaves , the believers
Then We drowned/sunk the others/lasts
And that truly from his group/party/follower (was) Abraham (E)

When he said to his father and nation: "What (do) you worship

So what (is) your thought/assumption with (about) the creations all together`s/ (universes`) Lord

So they turned away from him giving their backs

So they (his nation) approached/came to him hurrying/hastening
He said: "Do you worship what you carve out/cut
And God created you and what you make/do
They said: "Build/construct for him a building/structure, so throw him away in the place of intense heat/roaring fire

My Lord grant/present (for) me from the correct/righteous
So We announced good news to him with a clement boy

That truly that it is (E) the test, the clear/evident

We (E), like that We reimburse the good doers
That they truly are from Our worshippers/slaves the believers
And that Elias (is) from (E) the messengers
When he said to his nation: "Do you not fear and obey

God (is) your Lord, and your fathers`/forefathers` lord the first/beginners

And We left on him in the others/lasts

And that truly Lot (was) from (E) the messengers

So had it not been for that he (was) from the praising/glorifying
He would have stayed/remained in its belly/inside to a day/time they be sent/resurrected/revived

So ask/take their opinion is to your Lord the daughters, and for them (are) the sons

Is (it) not that they truly are from their lies/falsehood, they say (E)
God gave birth . And that they truly are lying/denying/falsifying (E)

So you truly are, and what you worship

That they truly, they are (E) the victorious

So turn away from them until a time/period of time

S/C/SAD and the Koran (owner) of the reminder/remembrance

And the assembly/nobles set out that: "Walk and be patient on your gods, that (E) (is) a thing (E) is being wanted/intended
We did not hear/listen with that in the religion/faith the last, that (E) that is except creations/inventions
Is the reminder/remembrance descended on (to) him from between us? But they are in doubt/suspicion from My remembrance/reminder, but till now they did not taste/experience My torture

And those do not look/see/watch except (for) one loud strong cry/torture raid, (there is) nothing from (a) recovery/awakening for it

That We, We manipulated/subjugated the mountains with him, they praise/glorify at the evening/first darkness and the sun rise
And the birds gathered, each/all for him (are) returning
And We strengthened/supported his ownership/kingdom, and We gave/brought him the wisdom and judgment/decision (of) the speech/address/conversation
Did information/news (of) the disputers/adversaries/arguers come to you, when they climbed/scaled the center of the house/center of the assembly

When they entered on (to) David, so He was frightened/terrified from them, they said: "Do not fear (we are) two disputers/adversaries/arguers, some of us oppressed/transgressed on some (over each other), so judge/rule between us with the truth/just , and do not be unjust , and guide us to the road`s/way`s middle/straightness

That, this (is) my brother for him (are) nine and ninety ewes/female sheep, and for me (is) one ewe/female sheep. So he said: `Let me sponsor/maintain it.` And he overwhelmed me in the speech/conversation

He (David) said: "He had (E) caused injustice to you/oppressed you with requesting your ewe/female sheep to his ewes/female sheep, and that many from the associates/company some of them oppress/transgress (E) on some (each other) except those who believed and made/did the correct/righteous deeds, and little/few what they are." And David doubted/suspected that We tested him so he asked for forgiveness (from) his Lord, and he fell down bowing, and He repented/obeyed
So We forgave for him that, and that for him at Us (is) an advancement/rank/degree (E) and (a) good/beautiful return

You David, that We made/put you (as) a caliph/leader in the land/Earth , so judge/rule between the people with the truth/just , and do not follow the self attraction for desire , so it misguides you from God`s way/path , that those who misguide from God`s way/path, for them (is) a strong (severe) torture because (of) what they forgot the Account Day/Resurrection Day

And We did not create the skies/space and the earth/Planet Earth and what (is) between them (B) wastefully/falsely , that is those who disbelieved`s doubt/suspicion, so calamity/scandal to those who disbelieved from the fire
Or We make/put those who believed and made/did the correct/righteous deeds as/like the corrupting in the earth/Planet Earth, or We make/put the fearing and obeying as/like the debauchers/corrupters
A Book We descended it to you blessed, (so) they consider (E) its verses/ evidences and (to the owner`s) of the pure minds/hearts to mention/ remember
And We granted to David Soliman, blessed/praised the slave/servant that he truly is repentant
When the horses standing on three legs and the edge of the fourth hoof touching the ground (of) the beautiful necks were displayed/exhibited/showed on (to) him at the evening/first darkness

Return it on (to) me, so he started and continued with the shins/legs, and the necks rubbing/petting/anointing
And We had (E) tested/charmed Soliman and We threw on his throne/seat a body then he repented

Hell they roast/suffer (from) it, so how bad (are) the beds (destination)
This, so they will taste/experience it hot/cold water , and cold/decayed/rotten

That (it) is (only) inspired/transmitted to me except that I am a clear/evident warner/giver of notice
